title: A Minecraft Movie: New Trailer and Tickets on Sale
description: The post A Minecraft Movie: New Trailer and Tickets on Sale appeared first on Xbox Wire.
author: Joe Skrebels, Xbox Wire Editor-in-Chief
excerpt: A MINECRAFT MOVIE is almost here, but not before you get to sink your pickaxe into another trailer! Check out some never-before-seen footage from the Nether and meet more mobs in their movie form. Can you guess what happens when Garrett punches a creeper? It’s probably not hard to figure out for most of you but it’s still hilarious to watch.
text: News Written By Cristina Anderca Published 2/27/25 A Minecraft Movie: New trailer and tickets on sale Watch never-before-seen footage and grab your ticket A MINECRAFT MOVIE is almost here, but not before you get to sink your pickaxe into another trailer! Check out some never-before-seen footage from the Nether and meet more mobs in their movie form. Can you guess what happens when Garrett punches a creeper? It’s probably not hard to figure out for most of you but it’s still hilarious to watch.    Make sure you stay tuned until the very end to meet a fabulous new character...  We also have a surprise for US moviegoers – soar and dart through the Overworld sky with the jetpack add-on!* Get your hands on it and strap in by buying a ticket to to the film's opening weekend through our official A MINECRAFT MOVIE partner, Fandango. Now those piglins really won’t see you coming...   The movie is so close I can almost smell the popcorn... In fact, tickets are on sale right now! Make sure you get yours if you want to be the first to see A MINECRAFT MOVIE on opening weekend.   * Add-on requires Minecraft: Bedrock Edition (sold separately), with access to the internet.
html:
News

Written By
Cristina Anderca
Published
2/27/25

A Minecraft Movie: New trailer and tickets on sale

Watch never-before-seen footage and grab your ticket

A MINECRAFT MOVIE is almost here, but not before you get to sink your pickaxe into another trailer! Check out some never-before-seen footage from the Nether and meet more mobs in their movie form. Can you guess what happens when Garrett punches a creeper? It’s probably not hard to figure out for most of you but it’s still hilarious to watch.   

Make sure you stay tuned until the very end to meet a fabulous new character... 

We also have a surprise for US moviegoers – soar and dart through the Overworld sky with the jetpack add-on!* Get your hands on it and strap in by buying a ticket to to the film's opening weekend through our official A MINECRAFT MOVIE partner, Fandango. Now those piglins really won’t see you coming...  

The movie is so close I can almost smell the popcorn... In fact, tickets are on sale right now! Make sure you get yours if you want to be the first to see A MINECRAFT MOVIE on opening weekend.  

* Add-on requires Minecraft: Bedrock Edition (sold separately), with access to the internet.
